      • Matrix

        @Deprecated
public Matrix​(int rows,
              int cols,
              double rFactor)
        Deprecated.
        use the Matrix.Init.Gaussian class instead
        Creates a new randomized matrix.

        Randomizes with random.nextGaussian() * rFactor

        Parameters:
        rows - number of rows
        cols - number of columns
        rFactor - factor to randomize by

      • Matrix

        public Matrix​(double[][] mat)
        Create a matrix from an existing 2d array of doubles.

        Note that this constructor does not create a copy of the array passed in.

        Parameters:
        mat - the array to make the matrix with
